extract.html: A satellite is to be placed into a circular LEO at altitude h = 400 km. Assume R = 6.371×10^6 m and μ = 3.986×10^14 m^3 s^-2. Neglect drag during orbit. A brief prograde impulse circularizes at altitude.

questions.prompt: Q1. Explain why astronauts in orbit experience weightlessness even though gravity is not zero.
Q2. Compute circular orbital speed v = sqrt(μ/(R+h)) for h = 400 km. (m/s)
Q3. Specific orbital energy change |Δε| from sea level to 400 km (J/kg), using ε = -μ/(2r).
